History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Parks and Recreation
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Returned Unsigned by Mayor
This Introduction was City Charter Rule Adopted

Attachments.Name: Int. No. 1338 - Fiscal Impact Statement - City Council
Legislative Documents - Letter to the Mayor

Summary: This bill would co-name 128 thoroughfares and public places, based on requests of Council Members whose district includes the location.  Of these 128 co-names, 16 are either a relocation of a previously enacted co-naming or a revision to the street sign installed with respect to a previously enacted co-naming.
Text:
